channel.title: How to fix my dungeoneering [PI]
channel.description: i'm trieing to add dungeoneering to my server - atm the skill is in it working till lvl 99 (going to change it to lvl 120 lateron) - the dungeoneering point shops ect is added as well - the only thing is i can't find a way to make the npc give it exp i tried this code case 1968: c.dungPoints += 25; c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000, 24); c.Zammy = 0; - in Npc handler i dun get errors, but i don't lvl it. - the other thing i would do with it is let it tele u to an other room afther killing that npc - that untill 7 floors and u get a bigger npc (some type of boss) - afther that u tele home and come back the only issue is the code isn't working i tried to add it in action handler, i don't get errors or anything. i hope someone is able to solve it

item.title: How to fix my dungeoneering [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Are you adding this in the npc death method? If not, that’s where it needs to be going.

Maybe you could use something like

case NPC:

if (inDung()) {
dungPoints += 25;
addSkillXP(#,#);
}

break;

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix my dungeoneering [PI]
item.dc:creator: @eliasjuh12 eliasjuh12
item.description:
@eliasjuh12 wrote:

i’m trieing to add dungeoneering to my server

  • atm the skill is in it working till lvl 99 (going to change it to lvl 120 lateron)
  • the dungeoneering point shops ect is added as well
  • the only thing is i can’t find a way to make the npc give it exp i tried this code
    case 1968:
    c.dungPoints += 25;
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000, 24);
    c.Zammy = 0;
  • in Npc handler i dun get errors, but i don’t lvl it.
  • the other thing i would do with it is let it tele u to an other room afther killing that npc
  • that untill 7 floors and u get a bigger npc (some type of boss)
  • afther that u tele home and come back
    the only issue is the code isn’t working i tried to add it in action handler, i don’t get errors or anything.
    i hope someone is able to solve it

Read full topic
